summary: DEE stream - A professional OTT streaming platform website for digital movie premieres, independent films, regional cinema, web series, and original content distribution
architectural_notes: White and soft blue gradient theme with premium corporate OTT platform aesthetic
Modern fonts (Poppins/Montserrat style), smooth hover animations, professional spacing
Mobile responsive design with fast loading and SEO optimization
DEE stream logo placement in header (center or left aligned)
Clean code structure ready for future video integration
No phone number displayed anywhere on the website per requirements
Use uploaded DEE stream logo (red and blue design with play button) in header and footer
Add cinematic OTT-themed background image for hero section to complement platform branding
Header should display 'DEE stream' text alongside logo with styling matching the logo's red and blue theme

existing_features.title: Create a cinematic hero section with headline 'Where New Cinema Begins', subtext 'Stream Movies, Web Series & Digital Premieres Anytime, Anywhere', two CTA buttons ('Watch Now' and 'Submit Your Film'), and a cinematic abstract light effect background

Create About DEE stream section with heading 'About DEE stream' and content: 'DEE stream is an emerging OTT streaming platform dedicated to digital movie releases, independent cinema, regional storytelling, and original web series. Our mission is to create a global platform where new filmmakers and fresh stories can reach audiences worldwide.'

Create What We Offer section with grid layout displaying five services with icons: 'Digital Movie Premieres', 'Independent Film Distribution', 'Regional Cinema Streaming', 'Web Series & Originals', 'OTT Release Platform for Filmmakers'

Create For Filmmakers section with heading 'Release Your Film on DEE stream', content 'We provide digital distribution opportunities for independent filmmakers, production houses, and content creators. Partner with us to stream your film worldwide.', and a 'Submit via Email' CTA button

Create Social Media section with heading 'Connect With Us' and clickable icons linking to Instagram (https://www.instagram.com/dee_stream?igsh=MXFlaDd2cTJtZmdubA==) and Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61588337463094&mibextid=ZbWKwL)
Create Contact section with heading 'Contact DEE stream', display email 'dee.streaming.cinema@gmail.com', and include a contact form with Name, Email, and Message fields
Create footer with DEE stream logo, tagline 'Where New Cinema Begins', quick links section, social media icons, and copyright line 'Â© 2026 DEE stream. All Rights Reserved.'
Implement header with DEE stream logo positioned center or left-aligned, using clean white and soft blue gradient theme throughout the website

Apply premium design styling with bold modern fonts (Poppins or Montserrat style), smooth hover animations on interactive elements, professional spacing and layout, and ensure full mobile responsiveness
Generate the DEE stream official logo to be used in header and footer with professional OTT platform branding
Replace the generated DEE stream logo with the uploaded logo image (file_00000000cbac71fd922f7862b22c3079.png) in the header and footer components
Add a cinematic background image related to OTT platforms or streaming services to the website, replacing or complementing the current background styling
Create a Featured Films Showcase section displaying highlighted content available on the DEE stream platform
Create a Filmmaker Testimonials section showcasing reviews and feedback from content creators who have partnered with DEE stream
Add 'DEE stream' text next to the logo in the website header, styled with matching logo theme colors and using the Poppins font family consistent with the website typography

Contact section with email display and contact form (Name, Email, Message fields)
Footer with DEE stream logo, tagline, quick links, social media icons, and copyright line
Featured films showcase section displaying highlighted content on the platform
